content:
I cannot predict the specific strategies or plans that amazon will pursue in the future. however, given amazon's history of innovation and its success in disrupting traditional industries, it is likely that the company will continue to expand into new areas in the future. 

technology and healthcare seem to be some of the areas where amazon is investing significant resources and talent, and it is possible that the company will continue to focus on these areas in the near future. however, amazon's expansion into new markets and industries will depend on various factors such as market demand, profitability, and regulatory environment. 

overall, it will be interesting to see how amazon will continue to innovate and disrupt various industries in the coming years.
